```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(GwasDataImport)
```

Create meta

```{r, eval=FALSE}
y <- Dataset$new(igd_id=id)
y$collect_metadata(list(trait="updated trait", build="HG19/GRCh37", category="NA", subcategory="NA", group_name="public", population="European", sex="Males", note='asdasd'))
y$api_metadata_edit()
y$api_metadata_check() %>% httr::content()
y$collect_metadata(list(trait="updated trait again", build="HG19/GRCh37", category="NA", subcategory="NA", group_name="public", population="European", sex="Males", note='asdasd'))
y$api_metadata_edit()
y$api_metadata_check() %>% httr::content()
```
